== Architecture Overview ==

=== System Components ===

<syntaxhighlight lang="mermaid">
graph TB
    A[Web Application] --> B[Django Framework]
    B --> C[PostgreSQL Database]
    B --> D[Redis Cache]
    B --> E[Celery Workers]

    F[External Systems] --> G[MSSQL ETOOLS]
    F --> H[External PostgreSQL]

    I[Monitoring] --> J[Prometheus]
    I --> K[Grafana]
    I --> L[Flower]

    M[Development] --> N[Testing Tools]
    M --> O[Code Quality]
    M --> P[Documentation]
</syntaxhighlight>

=== Data Flow ===

<syntaxhighlight lang="mermaid">
graph LR
    A[User Request] --> B[Web Server]
    B --> C[Django Application]
    C --> D{Database Operation?}
    D -->|Yes| E[PostgreSQL]
    D -->|No| F{External Data?}
    F -->|Yes| G[ETOOLS MSSQL]
    F -->|No| H{Async Task?}
    H -->|Yes| I[Celery Worker]
    H -->|No| J[Response]

    K[Background Tasks] --> L[Celery Beat]
    L --> M[Task Queue]
    M --> I

    N[Monitoring] --> O[Prometheus]
    O --> P[Grafana]
    I --> Q[Flower]
</syntaxhighlight>
